Macros
HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK
HWA Driver External Data Structures » HWA_MACROS

Macros that define values to use for HWA_CommonConfig_t::configMask when specifying which values in the HWA_CommonConfig_t are valid. More...

Macros

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS   0x00000001
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX   0x00000002
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX   0x00000004
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE   0x00000008
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_BPMRATE   0x00000010
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_BPMPATTERN   0x00000020
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD   0x00000040
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_TWIDDITHERENABLE   0x00000080
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_LFSRSEED   0x00000100
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFTSUMDIV   0x00000200
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_CFARTHRESHOLDSCALE   0x00000400
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_I_CMULT_SCALE   0x00001000
 
#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_Q_CMULT_SCALE   0x00002000
 

Detailed Description

Macros that define values to use for HWA_CommonConfig_t::configMask when specifying which values in the HWA_CommonConfig_t are valid.

Macro Definition Documentation

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_BPMPATTERN   0x00000020

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::bpmPattern is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_BPMRATE   0x00000010

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::bpmRate is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_CFARTHRESHOLDSCALE   0x00000400

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::cfarThresholdScale is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFT1DENABLE   0x00000008

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::fft1DEnable is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_FFTSUMDIV   0x00000200

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::fftSumDiv is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_I_CMULT_SCALE   0x00001000

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::i_cmult_scale is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_INTERFERENCETHRESHOLD   0x00000040

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::interferenceThreshold is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_LFSRSEED   0x00000100

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::lfsrSeed is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_NUMLOOPS   0x00000001

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::numLoops is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTARTIDX   0x00000002

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::paramStartIdx is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_PARAMSTOPIDX   0x00000004

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::paramStopIdx is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_Q_CMULT_SCALE   0x00002000

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::q_cmult_scale is valid

#define HWA_COMMONCONFIG_MASK_TWIDDITHERENABLE   0x00000080

Use when HWA_CommonConfig_t::twidDitherEnable is valid
